Origin: Gaithersburg Maryland and Washington, D.C., U.S.A.
Past members: Initial line-up: Dudley Connell - lead vocals, banjo, guitar Richard Underwood - vocals, banjo Eddie D'Zmura (musician/vocalist/mandolin/composer who recorded on the first three discs including Rounder 0135 Self Titled The Johnson Mountain Boys David McLaughlin - vocals, mandolin, fiddle, lead guitar Eddie Stubbs - vocals, fiddle Larry Robbins - bassOther Members: Tom Adams - vocals, banjo, mandolin (joined 1986) Marshall Wilborn - vocals, bass (joined 1986)Earl Yager - bass Warren Blair - not a band member but played fiddle on the album Blue Diamond.
